title:
Should personality disorders be part of Schizophrenia Spectrum?   




I looked at the symptom of most personality disorders, the symptoms of most personality disorders looks similar to Schizophrenia - Quora

response.answer_text: Honestly this is what I thought my husband had before I realized it was NPD. The accusations and things they come up with are so far fetched it will blow your mind. So yes I think so!
